## Summary

- Describe the changes introduced in this PR.
- Mention the lab number or area affected (e.g., `lab03`, `data scripts`, `docs`).

## Author / Group

- Group number or instructor name
- Member list (if student submission)

## Testing

- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run test:data`
- [ ] Other (describe): ...

## Checklist

- [ ] Folder naming follows `group_<nn>/<lab>/...` (student submissions)
- [ ] Instructions or starter files updated when behavior changed
- [ ] No large binaries or secrets committed
- [ ] Documentation updated (if required)

## Notes

- Outstanding questions, blockers, or follow-up tasks
- Screenshots/logs when useful for reviewers
